mn40:2.3_0: Tesaṁ vo, bhikkhave, evaṁsamaññānaṁ sataṁ evaṁpaṭiññānaṁ sataṁ:
mn40:2.5_0: evaṁ no ayaṁ amhākaṁ samaññā ca saccā bhavissati paṭiññā ca bhūtā;

mn40:2.6_2: amhākañcevāyaṁ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā’ti.
